update.update_msg: update your app for grt all favorite now

posts.title: Large aperture and real bokeh effect
posts.written: Focos brings DSLR-like photography to your iPhone with big aperture and real bokeh effect, which most photographers have always desired.

posts.title: Tap to focus after shooting
posts.written: Portrait photo with depth data allows you to focus after shooting like the hacker technology.

posts.title: Kinds of diaphragms
posts.written: Various diaphragms generate different bokeh spot effects. It's the fun of out-of-focus.

posts.title: Professional-grade lens
posts.written: Professional options simulate the pro lens such as creamy, bilinear, swirl and so on. Creamy is the characteristic of good lens and makes the edge of bokeh spot softer. Bilinear is the shortcoming of some lens but can stoke spot. Swirly lens highlights center object surrounded by swirly bokeh.
